text: The blue-mouthed skink (Caesoris novaecaledoniae) is a skink in the (family Scincidae). It is monotypic in the genus Caesoris. It is endemic to New Caledonia. ==References== Category:Reptiles of New Caledonia Category:Skinks Category:Reptiles described in 1926 Category:Taxa named by Hampton Wildman Parker
title: Blue-mouthed skink
